import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Layout from './src/components/Layout'; import axios from 'axios'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; const CreateTask = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', description: '', priority: 'medium', category: 'Development', dueDate: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { const response = await axios.post('/api/tasks', formData); if (response.data.success) { toast.success('Task created successfully!'); navigate('/tasks'); } else { toast.error('Failed to create task'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error creating task:', error); toast.error('Failed to create task. Please try again.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handleCancel = () => { navigate('/tasks'); }; return (

Create New Task

Add a new task to your project management system

Task Details

Choose a clear, descriptive title that summarizes the task
Include specific requirements, acceptance criteria, and any relevant details
Set the urgency level for this task
Categorize this task for better organization
When should this task be completed?

Task Preview

Title: {formData.title || 'Enter task title'}
Description: {formData.description || 'Enter task description'}
Priority: {formData.priority} Category: {formData.category} Due: {formData.dueDate || 'Select date'}

üí° Task Creation Tips

‚úÖ
Be Specific: Use clear, actionable titles like "Set up Docker containers for React app" instead of "Fix Docker"
üìã
Include Details: Add technical requirements, acceptance criteria, and any dependencies in the description
‚ö°
Set Realistic Deadlines: Consider the complexity and your other commitments when setting due dates
üéØ
Prioritize Wisely: Use "High" for urgent/blocking tasks, "Medium" for important work, "Low" for nice-to-have items
); }; export default CreateTask;
